bullet_points: Analyze the ticket data to identify potential research areas.
Generate 5 innovative and diverse research project ideas.
Ensure ideas are relevant to the dataset and have potential for impact.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Generate 5 new research project ideas related to the ticket data.

bullet_points: Evaluate each idea for feasibility, originality, and potential impact.
Provide constructive criticism and suggest improvements.
Identify any ideas that may not be viable or relevant.
Review the critiques provided by the idea_hater.
Choose 2 ideas with the most potential for success.
Refine and enhance these ideas based on the feedback.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Select and improve 2 out of the 5 research project ideas.

bullet_points: Assess the improvements made to the selected ideas.
Provide further feedback on how to enhance these ideas.
Ensure the ideas are robust and well-developed.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Critique the 2 improved research project ideas.

bullet_points: Compare the two improved ideas based on the latest critiques.
Determine which idea has the highest potential for success.
Finalize the selection of the best research project idea.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Select the best idea out of the 2 improved ideas.

bullet_points: Create a compelling and descriptive title for the research project.
Write a concise 5-sentence description outlining the project's objectives, significance, and potential impact.
Ensure the description is clear and engaging to attract interest.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Report the best idea in the form of a scientific paper title with a 5-sentence description.
